idea:

idea:
Sehat Energy & Foods Industries, manufacturers of Chana Sattu, Energy Drinks products in India. Our range of products are a source for healthy and balanced nutrition.We are dedicated to delivering safe, healthy, premium-quality, 100% natural, No preservatives, no chemical ingredients and supply assurance using a diverse, long-standing grower network and the highest safety standards.

Chana Sattu is roasted gram full of nutrients like fiber, proteins and multivitamins. Its is a complete meal substitute which encourages balanced and healthy diet plan. It is healthy, filling, refreshing and gives instant energy.

Ever heard of Chana Sattu in fruit flavours?

The ultimate household liquid food chana sattu now available in mouth watering flavours in bottle form.

The only company in the world who has launched Sattu in fruit flavours and in bottle form.
name: SAMPURN SEHAT INDUSTRIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: SPORLOC is an omni channel sports platform. We take over turf grounds for management and market them through our Online platform. We promote our online platform through the grounds & we promote our grounds through our online platform.
name: Sporloc Media Private Limited

idea:
What do we do?
Green Rain is a real-time graphics studio where creative minds with technical expertise collaborate to create unique immersive installations. Our interactive creations function as portals to magical virtual worlds. Our work leverages cutting-edge technology and blends thought provoking art with human-centric design.

Why do we do it?
We are determined to change the way people perceive and interact with their environments. We believe that interactivity must go way beyond the screen. We believe that humans should not have to adapt to technology, but that technology should adapt to humans. We believe that technology does not limit art, rather it has the potential to liberate and amplify it. We believe that when creative minds and technologists work together the result can be far more than the sum of the parts.
name: GREEN RAIN STUDIOS LLP

idea: I have a 10-year experience in the FMCG industry and have quit my job at Marico Ltd last year to start my personal care company. I intend to launch a skin and hair care brand in the next 3 months. I have 10 products in the pipeline and am looking for investors and mentors to guide me through this journey.
name: Uhuru Cosmetics Private Limited

idea: U Connect is a web and mobile-enabled platform to help service providers to connect with customers all over the world through video telephoning instead of physical presence. They can do this from the convenience of their home at any time, which reduces a lot of intermediary costs. From a customer-aspect, it focusses on the convenience of location, a wider variety of choices and economical prices in comparison to the market. For a professional to register with us, their credentials will have to be verified after which they will be listed. They can make money apart from their regular 9-5 job without wasting time on commuting or having to directly approach customers.
name: U Connect
